Articles.Content:
I am going to every now and then write here my current stats in my Pokemon Y Nuzlocke.

I am playing with the regular rules and that you can only catch the first two pokemon you find in a new area, and for whenever I beat a gym, I get a "Gym Catch" where I can pick when I will use my gym catch (Before I know what the pokemon is).

As of 11/30/13 (or 30/11/13) 11:54 AM EST

Current Stats

Caught : 14

Alive : 12

Dead : 2

Badges : 1.

EDIT : Current team is

Farfetch'd (AKA Andy)

Vivillion (AKA The King)

Skiddo (AKA Triscasr)

Fennekin (AKA Mewtwo)

Squirtle (AKA JusticeTom)

Pancham (AKA JDMD)

That is what I will post every time I revisit.

Edited November 30, 2013 by Sesni
Adding stuff
